text:
:wave: Hello, team!

Is there anyone who could assist me in creating a ‘Social_Sharing’ module and applying it to my footer?

I have recently started a new role and the previous marketer hired a external company to create the website and I am struggling to understand their code :(

Hi All,

I'm working with tailwind wich is going alright so far, but im kinda stuck on getting the drag and drop to work.
I have tried to use the cms boilerplate layout css code but tailwind doesn't reconize the jinja in the css file.
How can add the drag and drop while stil using tailwind ?

im using this folder to work with tailwind
<https://github.com/ozguruysal/HubSpot-tailwind>

If you want a Tailwind starter, I suggest <https://github.com/emptypockets-dev/create-HubSpot-project|create-HubSpot-project> instead. It has similar issues of being abandoned and needing to be updated to new versions of Tailwind and PostCSS, but it *does* come pre-configured with HubL-CSS/Tailwind compatibility.

If you’d rather not use a new starter, you can manually incorporate the <https://github.com/spingroup/postcss-hubl|postcss-hubl plugin> into your build process.
